verses.verse: I am for peace; But when I speak, they are for war.
God the Help of Those Who Seek Him A Song of Ascents. [1] I (Gen. 25:13; Is. 21:16; 60:7; Jer. 2:10; 49:28; Ezek. 27:21) will lift up my eyes to the hillsâ€” From whence comes my help?
((Jer. 3:23)) My help comes from the LORD, Who made heaven and earth.
((Ps. 124:8)) He will not allow your foot to be moved; (1 Sam. 2:9; Prov. 3:23, 26) He who keeps you will not slumber.
Behold, He who keeps Israel Shall neither slumber nor sleep.
The LORD is your keeper; The LORD is ((Ps. 127:1; Prov. 24:12); Is. 27:3) your shade (Is. 25:4) at your right hand.
(Ps. 16:8) The sun shall not strike you by day, Nor the moon by night.
The LORD shall preserve you from all evil; He shall (Ps. 91:5; Is. 49:10; Jon. 4:8; Rev. 7:16) preserve your soul.
The LORD shall (Ps. 41:2) preserve your going out and your coming in From this time forth, and even forevermore.
